string.text:
A luxury in the Zone, offering a brief boost to stamina and alertness. Its rich aroma and warmth provide a small but invaluable comfort to Stalkers enduring the cold and exhaustion of the wasteland.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Stimulant
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
